name: Meteor Purge
description:
launches an explosive Meteor, damaging enemies in 5m radius for 126 + 126% Weapon Damage.

When charged more than 33%, Meteor Purge applies Burning to all targets hit.
When charged more than 66%, Meteor Purge also applies Blackmantle to all targets hit.
When charged more than 99%, Meteor Purge also applies a Knockdown to all targets.

Blackmantle absorbs incoming Healing until 5000 points of Health are healed or until it expires after 30 seconds.
